definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

sentences.english: Speculators fearing a crackdown might want to use the time they have left to sell short.
sentences.chinese: 害怕痛擊的投機分子也許會利用剩餘的時間去拋空。

sentences.english: Stocks continue their slide with investors favoring a sell-off.
sentences.chinese: 投資者意向拋空，股票持續下滑。
